effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 881,029 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 335,588.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,158 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 188 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your healing spells and abilities have a chance to summon Mister Pick-Me-Up for 6 sec, firing a healing beam every 2 sec that jumps between 5 injured allies to restore 108,460 health each.

Overhealing from this effect irradiates allies to deal Nature damage to nearby enemies over 1.5 sec, increased by additional overhealing.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Cloak of Temporal Recalibration

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
Equip: Your attacks have a very high chance to contaminate your target with industrial runoff up to 25 times, dealing 1,117 Shadow damage per stack every 3 sec until their demise.
